means: <史>人民委员（前苏联政府部长）

sentence.Network_en: He has the authority to act for the commissar.
The commissar is the living embodiment of the Immortal Emperor's own will.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (Russian Revolution): from Russian komissar, from French commissaire, from medieval Latin commissarius (see commissary)

means.word_mean: 1. an official of the Communist Party who was assigned to teach party principles to a military unit
